TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NavigationProperty extends System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmMember

Docs.summary: Represents the navigation from one entity type to another entity type in the conceptual model .

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about how to use the NavigationProperty in a conceptual model, see [NavigationProperty Element (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5829a238-a50e-4c81-901d-7b54fc00f27e).

Docs.summary: Gets the built-in type kind for this .
Docs.value: A object that represents the built-in type kind for this .

Docs.summary: Gets the "from" relationship end member in this navigation.
Docs.value: The "from" relationship end member in this navigation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmProperty> GetDependentProperties() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the foreign key properties for a navigation property that is on the dependent end of a referential constraint.
Docs.returns: A collection of the foreign key properties.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For a navigation property that is on the dependent end of a referential constraint, the GetDependentProperties method returns the corresponding foreign key properties. The returned properties will be in the same order as the principal end key properties.
If the navigation property is not on the dependent end of a referential constraint, the GetDependentProperties method returns an empty collection.

Docs.summary: Gets the relationship type that this navigation property operates on.
Docs.value: The relationship type that this navigation property operates on.

Docs.summary: Gets the "to" relationship end member of this navigation.
Docs.value: The "to" relationship end member of this navigation.
